name: Daily Dose of Happiness #1
description:
“Daily Dose of Happiness” is a diary about emotional state characterised by feelings of satisfaction, joy, and whatever it is that makes human happy. It’s a series of my work that start in 2020. Here we go, chapter one of this series.

And don’t forget,
“If you want to be happy, Just be!” ~Leo Tolstoy

Love,
Adnan Aditya
